content.body: Would it be okay if, in the plenary agenda, I asked to move 15 minutes from one of my agenda items to another one of my agenda items?
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: Would it be okay if, in the plenary agenda, I asked to move 15 minutes from one of my agenda items to another one of my agenda items?

content.body: Please raise the PR now. The agenda gets adopted at the start of the meeting.
And chairs are doing the scheduling right now. So we need the info ASAP.
And a reminder to all delegates, if you have personal scheduling constraints, put them on the agenda ahead of time (or now). Otherwise we have very little wiggle room.
